title: Eureka Seven
alternative_title: 交響詩篇エウレカセブン; Koukyou Shihen Eureka Seven; Eureka 7; Eureka Seven Psalms of Planets; Koukyoushi Hen: Eureka Seven
description: Eureka Seven tells the story of a 14 year-old named Renton who lives with his mechanic grandfather, and whose life is thrown somewhat off-kilter when a mech called Nirvash crashes into his house one day and a young girl called Eureka pops up asking for help to repair it. Shortly after, the military mechs get involved.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
